statements: SELECT * FROM historical_location_data
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM historical_location_data
SELECT user_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM historical_location_data ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_location_data WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM historical_location_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM historical_location_data WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC, location_id ASC
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM historical_location_data WHERE longitude > 0
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS location_count FROM historical_location_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM historical_location_data WHERE latitude < 0
SELECT * FROM historical_location_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, longitude, latitude FROM locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(longitude), AVG(latitude) FROM locations GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT geofence_id, center_longitude, center_latitude, radius FROM geofences;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE longitude > 0 AND latitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE longitude > 10 AND latitude < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, longitude, latitude FROM locations WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT location_id, longitude, latitude, timestamp FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -20 AND 0;
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM locations WHERE longitude < -50 OR latitude > 60 ORDER BY timestamp;

SELECT geofence_id, center_longitude, center_latitude, radius, COUNT(location_id) FROM geofences JOIN locations ON ST_DWithin(ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(center_longitude, center_latitude), 4326), ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(longitude, latitude), 4326), radius) GROUP BY geofence_id, center_longitude, center_latitude, radius;
SELECT * FROM historical_location_data;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM historical_location_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location_id FROM marketing_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT geofence_name, geofence_radius FROM geofence_data ORDER BY geofence_radius DESC;
SELECT geofence_id, geofence_name FROM geofence_data WHERE geofence_radius < 100;
SELECT * FROM historical_location_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM historical_location_data WHERE event_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT geofence_name, geofence_radius FROM geofence_data WHERE geofence_radius >= 10;
SELECT * FROM marketing_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_location_id FROM marketing_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofences WHERE radius > 10;
SELECT name, event_date FROM marketing_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, name, age FROM event_participants WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM marketing_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, age FROM event_participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM location_data WHERE location_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT geofence_id, name, latitude, longitude, radius FROM geofences WHERE radius > 100;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events;
SELECT geofence_id, latitude, longitude, radius FROM geofences;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT performance_id, campaign_id, geofence_id, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, address FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, address FROM events JOIN locations ON events.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, geofence_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 AND clicks > 500;
